# Tender Announcement: Roofing Upgrades for Grande Cache Institution

## Tender Details

* **Tender Title:** EW038-241342 Roofing Upgrades - Grande Cache Institution
* **Reference Number:** WS4313940434-Doc4313957886
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4313940434
* **Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** December 12, 2023
* **Procurement Category:** Construction and Infrastructure (CNST)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Notice Type and Description

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Roofing Upgrades at the Grande Cache Institution in Grande Cache, Alberta. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking tenders on behalf of the Correctional Services Canada (CSC).

## Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit will take place on December 12, 2023, at 11:00 AM MST. Interested bidders are required to meet at the Grande Cache Institution, located at 347 Hoppe Avenue, Grande Cache, Alberta T0E 0Y0.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender evaluation criteria are based on the lowest price. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or further information, please contact:
Matthew Virakorn
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender URL

The tender notice and supporting documentation can be found on Ariba Discovery at <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18081609?extsite=MTgwODE2MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Note:** Please disregard the original posting response deadline closing time and Ariba Discovery posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST.  You have been warned about
